price: Kwa mfano wa haya nawatende watendao.
footnotes: Ili wapate ukarimu wa Akhera kama walio bahatika kuupata Waumini, basi nawafanye kazi duniani hao wafanyao kazi, ili wapate kama walio pata wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
